DOC.brief_summary: A Study to determine if a high-fat meal has an effect on the pharmacokinetics of bosutinib.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Determine the Effect of a High-Fat Meal on the Relative Bioavailability and Pharmacokinetics of a Single Dose of Bosutinib Administered Orally to Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy men, age 1850; Healthy women of nonchildbearing potential, age 1850.
